quote_first: “My friend,” she said with a pleased tone to her voice that she knew he could not mistake. She didn’t care, she was pleased to hear from him, even if it was
quote_last: . “Where are you calling from?” she asked, expecting him to say Glasgow or Berlin.
title: It All Began in Monte Carlo
author: Elizabeth Adler

quote_first: When fifteen minutes have passed and the bogus DPW truck hasn’t returned, Billy decides they have either moved on to another part of the city, maybe to check out the house on Evergreen Street, or have gone back to the McMansion to await further orders from Nick. He closes the curtain, shutting out the view, and looks at his watch.
quote_last: . How time flies when you’re having fun, he thinks.
title: Billy Summers
author: Stephen King

quote_first: The station clock told him the time:
quote_last: . He went to the booking office and asked the clerk in a polite tone when was the next train to Paris. ‘In twelve minutes.’
title: The Man Who Watched the Trains Go By
author: Georges Simenon
